metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2214 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In binder_transaction of binder.c, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-136210786References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
